text:
Hey everyone -

Here's a workflow custom code in 2 parts that will let you feed contact info to Drafter AI workflows to trigger intelligent automation
:bulb: This code feeds contact info to drafter AI workflows to trigger a drafter AI workflow run
:bulb:This code captures the response from the drafter ai workflow and updates contact properties with the response
in this example we put a 1 minute delay between code block 1 and code block 2 to give enough time for the execution to finish on Drafter AI's end
(workflow code blocks have a max execution time of 20 seconds - this workflow on Drafter AI's end takes an average of 25 seconds to complete)
then the second code block executes, retrieves the response, and updates the contact's properties for `emailsubject`, `emailbody`, and `emailsignature`.
IMPORTANT: `emailbody` is a rich text property so it can store line breaks
you can then use a sequence with only personalization tokens to send dynamic and personalized custom emails to your prospects

properly done, it can send emails like so.

We can similarly use this to use dynamic AI powered reasoning using Drafter AI to trigger advanced workflow logic - take a look and let us know how you get on with a free month at <http://drafter.ai|drafter.ai>.

We're looking for feedback prior to submitting as a custom workflow action for the marketplace soon
